title: MS Dhoni appointed as Citroen's brand ambassador in India
description: French automaker Citroen named former India cricket captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni as their brand ambassador in India. The company said that Dhoni aligned with their commitment to electric mobility and sustainability, and emphasised their shared dedication to customer-centric innovation. Citroen aims to reinforce its presence in the Indian market and resonate with local sentiments, particularly among cricket enthusiasts.
